1394CF37.Mod4_Description: Enemies damaged by {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} are Stunned for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds.

74D6BC35.Mod2_Description: Damaging an enemy with {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} increases your Critical Strike Chance against them by {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:AMPLIFY_CRIT_CHANCE}{/c} seconds.

C435C5B6.Mod3_Description: {c_important}Shadow Step's{/c} Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds when it damages an enemy you haven't hit with {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} in the last {c_number}{SF_18}{/c} seconds.
